description: Visual time-of-day feedback with clock UI, phase-based background styling, sun/moon icons, time speed controls, and accessibility text

userStories.title: Clock UI Component
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see a clock displaying the current game hour so I always know what time it is in the game
acceptanceCriteria: Create TimeClockComponent displaying the current hour (0-23) in a readable format
Show the hour as a circular or linear clock face
Update in real time as the game clock advances
Position in a consistent, non-obstructive location in the game UI
Component uses OnPush change detection
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Phase-Based Background Styling
userStories.description: As a player, I want the game background to change based on the time of day so I can visually distinguish day from night
acceptanceCriteria: Day phase: Bright, warm-toned background or overlay
Night phase: Dark, cool-toned background or overlay
Dawn: Gradual transition from dark to bright (warm orange tint)
Dusk: Gradual transition from bright to dark (purple/red tint)
Transitions use CSS animations for smoothness (no abrupt changes)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Sun/Moon Icon Display
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see a sun or moon icon reflecting the current time of day for an at-a-glance phase indicator
acceptanceCriteria: Show sun icon during day phase
Show moon icon during night phase
Show transitional icon (half sun/moon) during dawn and dusk
Icon positioned near the clock UI
Icon changes smoothly (fade or morph transition)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Time Speed Indicator and Controls
userStories.description: As a player, I want to see the current time speed and have controls to change it so I can control the pace of the game
acceptanceCriteria: Display current speed multiplier (1x, 2x, 4x) near the clock
Provide clickable buttons or toggle to cycle through speed options
Active speed is visually highlighted
Speed change takes effect immediately
Component uses OnPush change detection
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Accessibility Considerations
userStories.description: As a player with visual impairments, I want time information conveyed through text as well as visual effects
acceptanceCriteria: Clock displays numeric hour alongside any visual clock face
Phase name is displayed as text (not just color changes)
Speed indicator uses text labels alongside icons
All interactive elements have appropriate ARIA labels
Typecheck passes
